author: robervalwalsh
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains updates for Run3, improvements and small fixes to the trigger DQM codes for the MSSM Hbb triggers.
 - https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2214

#### PR validation:

Successful tests:
- CMSSW_12_4_X_2022-04-13-1100
  - Compiled: `scram b -j4`
  - runTheMatrix test workflows: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
- CMSSW_12_3_0_pre6 (as the recommendations below)
  - TSG recommended tests: followed the instructions from the twiki [HLTValidationAndDQM#Testing_Run_3_work_in_progress](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/HLTValidationAndDQM#Testing_Run_3_work_in_progress)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport
title: MSSM Hbb triggers DQM codes updates for Run3
